item.description:
Fri – Chelo's on the Waterfront  Live music– Those Guys Newport Band  7:00 to –11:00  

6:30 if you want to have dinner with us.  Please state in your RSVP note dinner or dancing only. Thanks! 

 

Known for its excellence, our Waterfront location combines great food, a great view, and live entertainment! Come enjoy one of our thirst-quenching drinks and a live band while you experience our mouth-watering food, our prompt and efficient service, and our gorgeous views overlooking Greenwich Bay. The Waterfront is unique for its two floors, outside/lawn seating, fire pits, four bars (two of them located on the outside decks), and its spacious yet cozy atmosphere.

 

    In September of 1996, Those Guys began, like most bands, in a basement in Somerset, Massachusetts. Since that time, they have been a staple in the RI bar scene--especially in their home town of Newport. Playing from Washington, DC to northern Vermont, they have shared the stage with acts as diverse as Staind, The Adam Ezra Group, and Saving Jane to Bo Bice, Cary Brothers, & Paul Stookey of Peter, Paul, & Mary.

 

While spending much of their time in the bars that they have made a name for themselves, they are now a popular choice in the circles throughout New England that demand a high-quality form of entertainment for private parties, weddings and corporate events catering to the 20-something through 50-something year-olds who refuse to act their age. Those groups include but are not limited to the Newport International Film Festival, The New England Patriots, high-profile members of the Boston Red Sox organization, The University of Rhode Island, Salve Regina University, Raytheon Corporation, and Georgetown Events in Washington, DC.

 

On the vocals, Johnny Halloran has the ability to capture the emotion and passion that you hear in your favorite song on the radio and, along with the band (Bob Siipola on guitar, Erik Usler on the drums, Bob Costa on the Keyboards, and Steven Burgess on the bass guitar), take that song to another level. THEY MAKE IT SOUND BETTER!! If you haven't seen them and you frequent bars in their earshot you really don't know what you are missing. You will dance! Even if you don't know how! Guaranteed!
item.how_to_find_us: ask for meet-up reservation, or look for us at the band area
item.name: Dance
